parameters.name: DatabaseAddress
parameters.description: The address of the database to query. Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to query.

parameters.name: DatabaseType
parameters.description:
The engine of the database to query. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **Oracle**
*   **PostgreSQL**
*   **SQLServer**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.\
Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

> We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the user group to query.
